name: Ball Toss Super Deluxe
description:
Finally play all the ball colors in one app! For more cost of the other two combined!! There’s no reason to pay for this!!! Especially if you’ve already bought Ball Toss Deluxe!!!!

I can’t stress this enough, you should not buy this version. If you want Red, Green, and Yellow you can get them for free in Ball Toss. You can pay less and get Blue in Ball Toss Deluxe. The only thing you get here is the ability to switch between all four colors in the same app. That’s not worth it. 

Please tell me you didn’t pay for this and Ball Toss Deluxe
